chunk:
Epicuren Discovery MOISTURE SURGE HYALURONIC ACID GEL

Brand: Epicuren

Category: Serums & Essences

Ingredients: Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Juice, Water (Aqua), Sodium Hyaluronate, Pentylene Glycol, Hydroxyethylcellulose, Tetrasodium EDTA, Potassium Sorbate, Sodium Benzoate, Citric Acid.

Directions: Following moisturizer application, apply a dime size
book: 2964-Epicuren Discovery MOISTURE SURGE HYALURONIC ACID GEL

chunk:
n, apply a dime size amount of product over entire face, neck, and décolleté. Follow with sunscreen.

Warnings: Some of Epicuren®'s products are manufactured in a facility that uses gluten, non-vegan ingredients, iodine, nuts, kernels, and nut-derived products. Because of this, it is possible that cross- contamination can occur.

Ingredient concern
book: 2964-Epicuren Discovery MOISTURE SURGE HYALURONIC ACID GEL

chunk: Ingredient concerns: MODERATE: Allergies & Immunotoxicity, Use Restrictions; LOW: Cancer, Developmental and Reproductive Toxicity
